title: PRIME LOCATION! SPACIOUS RENOVATED STREET LEVEL 1 BED in FENWAY.
posting_body: PROPERTY INFO
Rent: $2,400 / Month
Beds: 1
Bath: 1
Available Date: 09/01/2022
Pet: Cats Allowed
Rent Includes:: Hot Water
Parking:: street parking
AVAILABLE SEPTEMBER for a 12 month lease -- Fantastic deal on 1 bedroom street level unit on Jersey Street in Fenway by Back Bay Fens.
Includes hot water, hardwood throughout the apartment, big windows - lots of sun, RENOVATED open eat in kitchen with granite bar top and includes DISHWASHER and MICROWAVE, spacious tiled bathroom.
Ample amount of storage and space.
Laundry facilities are available on site.
Cats allowed.
Unfortunately the owner does not take students here.
PHD candidates with stipend will be considered on a case by case basis.
1 month fee!
The location is absolutely amazing.

Centrally located nearby Longwood Medical Area, giving access to multiple hospitals such as Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center, Boston's Children's Hospital, Brigham and Women's Hospital.and Dana Farber Cancer Institute.
Several train stations (Hynes Conventions is closest), multiple bus lines, and tons of entertainment all within short distance.
The Back Bay and Newbury Street & Boylston Street in one direction, and historic Fenway Park in the other.
The Emerald Necklace surrounds the area, offering walking and biking paths.
There are countless, stores, restaurants, pubs, and more all nearby.
To view this apartment or for any questions, please send inquires about this apartment to David.
